text:
@seanhannity @morningmika @Morning_Joe Mika & Joe are too busy lying and spewing repugnant hatred for @POTUS @realDonaldTrump @PressSec to have ever covered the WuhanVirus honestly. 

They are not journalists. They are fear mongers & it is sick to watch as an American.
